snippet: The president of Turkmenistan learned how hard it can be to maintain a cult of personality in the Internet era when the official account of his triumph in a horse race on Sunday was undermined by video posted on foreign Web sites.
abstract: The president of Turkmenistan learned how hard it can be to maintain a cult of personality in the Internet era when the official account of his triumph in a horse race on Sunday was undermined by video posted on foreign Web sites.

headline.main: Video of Turkmen Leader's Spectacular Fall Foils Effort to Cover Up Accident
